questiontext.text:
Exercise

  1. Find the area bounded by \(y= e^x\), the \(y\)-axis and the line \(x=2\). [[input:ans5]] [[validation:ans5]] [[feedback:prt5]]
  2. Find the area enclosed between \(y=x(x-{@aa@})(x-{@bb@})\) and the \(x\)-axis.[[input:ans6]] [[validation:ans6]] [[feedback:prt6]]

generalfeedback.text:
1. The curve \(y= e^x\), the \(y\)-axis and the line \(x=2\) intersect at \(x=0,2\).This area is above the \(x\) axis hence the area is \[\displaystyle\int_0^2 e^x \, \mathrm{d}x = {@ta5@}.\]

    A sketch of the curve \(y = {@exp5@}\) between \(x=0\) an \(x=2\) is shown below.

    [[jsxgraph width='300px' height='250px']] JXG.Options.axis.ticks.insertTicks = false; /*don't insert extra ticks between major ticks*/ JXG.Options.axis.ticks.majorHeight =40; JXG.Options.text.fontSize=16; JXG.Options.axis.ticks.ticksDistance=10; var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, {boundingbox: {#BB1#}, axis:false, showCopyright:false, showNavigation:false}); var f = board.jc.snippet('{#exp6#}', true, 'x', true); var ff = board.create('functiongraph',[function(x) {return Math.exp(x);}]); var i1 = board.create('integral',[{#[a,b]#},ff], {fillColor:'#003399',fillOpacity:0.15}); i1.curveLeft.setAttribute({visible:false}); /* hide the gliders */ i1.curveRight.setAttribute({visible:false}); i1.label.setAttribute({visible:false});/*hide the integral calculation*/ var xaxis = board.create('axis', [[0,0],[1,0]], {name:'x', withLabel: true, label: {position: 'rt', offset: [-5, 15] /* (in pixels)*/}}); board.create('ticks', [xaxis, {#[l1,u1]#}], {strokeColor: '#003399', majorHeight:15, drawLabels: true, label: { offset: [0, -5],anchorX: 'middle', anchorY: 'top' }}); yaxis = board.create('axis', [[0, 0], [0, 1]], {name:'y', withLabel: true, label: {position: 'rt', offset: [-20, 0] }}); [[/jsxgraph]]

  2. The curve \(y={@exp6@}\) and the \(x\) axis intersect at \(x = 0,{@aa@},{@bb@}\). Between \(0\) and {@aa@}, the area under the curve is above the \(x\) axis and between {@aa@} and {@bb@} , it is below the \(x\) axis. Hence the area is: \[\displaystyle\int_{@l2@}^{@aa@} x(x-{@aa@})(x-{@bb@}) \, \mathrm{d}x - \displaystyle\int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} x(x-{@aa@})(x-{@bb@}) \, \mathrm{d}x =\] \[\displaystyle\int_{@l2@}^{@aa@} ({@expand(exp6)@}) \, \mathrm{d}x - \displaystyle\int_{@aa@}^{@bb@}({@expand(exp6)@}) \, \mathrm{d}x =\] \[ \left[{@int(exp6,x)@} \right]_{@l2@}^{@aa@} -\left[{@int(exp6,x)@}\right]_{@aa@}^{@bb@} = {@ta6@} .\]
